Protection Types.quote: "The Lord is my rock, my fortress and my deliverer." (Psalm 18:2)

Divine Shield.quote: "But you, Lord, are a shield around me." (Psalm 3:3)

Spiritual Armor.quote: "Put on the full armor of God." (Ephesians 6:11)

Sacred Defense.quote: "Allah is the best guardian, and He is the most merciful of the merciful." (Quran 12:64)

Divine Guardianship.quote: "I will both lie down in peace, and sleep; For You alone, O Lord, make me dwell in safety." (Psalm 4:8)

Celestial Protection.quote: "The sun shall not strike you by day, nor the moon by night." (Psalm 121:6)

Divine Shelter.quote: "He who dwells in the shelter of the Most High will rest in the shadow of the Almighty." (Psalm 91:1)

Sacred Refuge.quote: "The name of the Lord is a strong tower; the righteous run to it and are safe." (Proverbs 18:10)

Divine Preservation.quote: "The Lord will keep you from all harmâ€” he will watch over your life." (Psalm 121:7)

Spiritual Covering.quote: "He shall cover you with His feathers, And under His wings you shall take refuge." (Psalm 91:4)

Divine Barriers.quote: "No weapon formed against you shall prosper." (Isaiah 54:17)

Sacred Boundaries.quote: "The Lord will guard your going out and your coming in." (Psalm 121:8)

Divine Watch.quote: "Behold, He who keeps Israel shall neither slumber nor sleep." (Psalm 121:4)

Protective Grace.quote: "My grace is sufficient for you." (2 Corinthians 12:9)

Divine Safeguard.quote: "Even though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil, for you are with me." (Psalm 23:4)

Sacred Shield.quote: "Krishna protected the Pandavas with His divine presence." (Mahabharata)

Divine Fortress.quote: "The eternal God is your refuge, and underneath are the everlasting arms." (Deuteronomy 33:27)

Spiritual Defense.quote: "May you be protected by all the powers of Buddha, Dharma and Sangha." (Buddhist Blessing)

Divine Sanctuary.quote: "In the shadow of your wings I will take refuge." (Psalm 57:1)

Protective Mantra.quote: "Om Tare Tuttare Ture Svaha - The mantra of divine protection." (Tibetan Buddhism)

Divine Security.quote: "I give them eternal life, and they shall never perish; no one will snatch them out of my hand." (John 10:28)

Sacred Armor.quote: "Truth shall be thy shield and buckler." (Psalm 91:4)

Divine Defense.quote: "For I, says the Lord, will be a wall of fire all around her." (Zechariah 2:5)

Protective Presence.quote: "I am with you always, even to the end of the age." (Matthew 28:20)

Divine Covering.quote: "He will cover you with his pinions, and under his wings you will find refuge." (Psalm 91:4)

Sacred Protection.quote: "Allah is the best of guardians and He is the most merciful of those who show mercy." (Quran 12:64)

Divine Safety.quote: "The Lord will keep your going out and your coming in from this time forth and forevermore." (Psalm 121:8)

Spiritual Guard.quote: "For he will command his angels concerning you to guard you in all your ways." (Psalm 91:11)

Divine Aegis.quote: "I am your shield, your very great reward." (Genesis 15:1)

Protective Power.quote: "Greater is He that is in you than he that is in the world." (1 John 4:4)
